fullText: There are a few musical gems, as well as eye-popping visual effects and even some supporting performances that rival Menzel’s. But the show itself hangs from a story that’s as thin as a reed, making for a sometimes-lumbering musical that tends to sag under the weight of its nearly two-hour runtime.
